mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.yuanjia_id AS "yuanjiaId", a.shoufeixiangmu_id AS "shoufeixiangmuId", a.yuanjia AS "yuanjia", a.xianjia AS "xianjia", a.qushengjiage AS "qushengjiage", a.shouruxiangmu_id AS "shouruxiangmuId", a.jiabanjiajialv AS "jiabanjiajialv", a.fushushoufeilv AS "fushushoufeilv", a.biandongyuanyin AS "biandongyuanyin", a.tiaojiaoshuoming AS "tiaojiaoshuoming", a.tiaojia_id AS "tiaojiaId", a.tiaojiaoren AS "tiaojiaoren", a.zhixingriqi AS "zhixingriqi", a.zhongzhiriqi AS "zhongzhiriqi", a.no AS "no", a.xuhao AS "xuhao", a.tiaojiahuizonghao AS "tiaojiahuizonghao"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useable_shoufeijiamu( id, yuanjia_id, shoufeixiangmu_id, yuanjia, xianjia, qushengjiage, shouruxiangmu_id, jiabanjiajialv, fushushoufeilv, biandongyuanyin, tiaojiaoshuoming, tiaojia_id, tiaojiaoren, zhixingriqi, zhongzhiriqi, no, xuhao, tiaojiahuizonghao ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{yuanjiaId}, #{shoufeixiangmuId}, #{yuanjia}, #{xianjia}, #{qushengjiage}, #{shouruxiangmuId}, #{jiabanjiajialv}, #{fushushoufeilv}, #{biandongyuanyin}, #{tiaojiaoshuoming}, #{tiaojiaId}, #{tiaojiaoren}, #{zhixingriqi}, #{zhongzhiriqi}, #{no}, #{xuhao}, #{tiaojiahuizonghao} )
mapper.update: UPDATE useable_shoufeijiamu SET yuanjia_id = #{yuanjiaId}, shoufeixiangmu_id = #{shoufeixiangmuId}, yuanjia = #{yuanjia}, xianjia = #{xianjia}, qushengjiage = #{qushengjiage}, shouruxiangmu_id = #{shouruxiangmuId}, jiabanjiajialv = #{jiabanjiajialv}, fushushoufeilv = #{fushushoufeilv}, biandongyuanyin = #{biandongyuanyin}, tiaojiaoshuoming = #{tiaojiaoshuoming}, tiaojia_id = #{tiaojiaId}, tiaojiaoren = #{tiaojiaoren}, zhixingriqi = #{zhixingriqi}, zhongzhiriqi = #{zhongzhiriqi}, no = #{no}, xuhao = #{xuhao}, tiaojiahuizonghao = #{tiaojiahuizonghao} WHERE id = #{id}
